law.catch_line: The Authority shall determine the times and places of its meetings....

text.section: The Authority shall determine the times and places of its meetings.

section.section: Four members of the Authority are a quorum.
Action by the Authority requires the affirmative vote of at least four members.

text.section:
A member of the Authority:
may not receive compensation as a member of the Authority; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
